title: I always encounter this error
body:
This message always comes up

Unknown Error

An unknown error occured

Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.

If you continue encountering this error you may want to check the support site or forum for more information.

replies.body: I have been having this problem too after logging on to the client. I get in, and have the same ip amount and match history but no champions even in match history I can not see which champion I played. I see loads of threads with this problem but no solution. plz help League is my favorite game so would hate to end now
